summary: The video features a man in a suit standing in an office-like setting, holding a phone. The first frame shows him looking at his phone with the text 'vote for Joe Biden,' followed by a photo of Joe Biden with American flags in the background. The second frame includes a caption stating, 'who's had dinner with anti-Semites, who said there was good people on both sides after Charlottesville. He's the last person I'm going to take advice from.' The audio transcript criticizes voting for Joe Biden, mentioning his association with anti-Semites and his comments after Charlottesville. The video appears to be politically charged, discussing political figures and their actions.
keywords: vote, Joe Biden, anti-Semites, dinner, Charlottesville, advice
